column4: Hello, I'm trying to add an entry to the bootloader for Fedora 12 in 9.10.  Anyone have any experience with this?  I'm not well acquainted with grub2
menu.lst is no more, you have to edit a specfic file
I think the syntax is the same except you have to remember the partitions start being counted at 1, not 0 but maybe trism can help you on that one
